languages.text: {n}Маршал смотрит на вас в упор.{/n} "В условиях сокращенных ресурсов абсолютная секретность — главная защита Летуса. Однако мы наблюдаем... скажем так, повышенную активность в районе мира-склада. Я не хочу этого делать, но банально вынужден просить вас о помощи: слетать на Летус и организовать вывоз десятины на Даргонус для дальнейшего хранения".

{n}The Marshal looks straight at you.{/n} "Given the scarcity of our resources, absolute secrecy is Leethus's main line of defence. However, we are detecting... increased activity near the storage world's location. I do not want to do this, but I am, quite plainly, forced to ask for your help: go to Leethus and organise the extraction of the Imperial Tithe to Dargonus for further safekeeping."
languages.original_text: {n}Маршал смотрит на вас в упор.{/n} "В условиях сокращенных ресурсов абсолютная секретность — главная защита Летуса. Однако мы наблюдаем... скажем так, повышенную активность в районе мира-склада. Я не хочу этого делать, но банально вынужден просить вас о помощи: слетать на Летус и организовать вывоз десятины на Даргонус для дальнейшего хранения".

I do not want to do this, but I am, quite plainly, forced to ask for your help: go to Leethus and organise the extraction of the Imperial Tithe to Dargonus for further safekeeping."

{n}The Marshal looks straight at you.{/n} "Given the scarcity of our resources, absolute secrecy is Leethus's main line of defence. However, we are detecting... increased activity near the storage world's location. I do not want to do this, but I am, quite plainly, forced to ask for your help: go to Leethus and organise the extraction of the Imperial Tithe to Dargonus for further safekeeping."

languages.text: {n}Le maréchal vous regarde sans détour.{/n} « Au vu de la rareté de nos ressources, le secret absolu est la principale ligne de défense de Leethus. Cependant, nous détectons actuellement... une activité accrue à proximité de la planète. J'aurais préféré faire autrement, mais je n'ai d'autre choix que de m'en remettre à vous : rendez-vous sur place et supervisez l'extraction de la dîme impériale vers Dargonus, où elle sera mise en sûreté. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal looks straight at you.{/n} "Given the scarcity of our resources, absolute secrecy is Leethus's main line of defence. However, we are detecting... increased activity near the storage world's location. I do not want to do this, but I am, quite plainly, forced to ask for your help: go to Leethus and organise the extraction of the Imperial Tithe to Dargonus for further safekeeping."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maréchal vous regarde sans détour.{/n} « Au vu de la rareté de nos ressources, le secret absolu est la principale ligne de défense de Leethus. Cependant, nous détectons actuellement... une activité accrue à proximité de la planète. J'aurais préféré faire autrement, mais je n'ai d'autre choix que de m'en remettre à vous : rendez-vous sur place et supervisez l'extraction de la dîme impériale vers Dargonus, où elle sera mise en sûreté. »

languages.text: {n}El Mariscal te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Dada nuestra escasez de recursos, el secretismo absoluto es la principal defensa de Leethus. Sin embargo, estamos detectando... un aumento de actividad cerca de la ubicación del mundo almacén. No me gusta, pero me veo francamente forzado a solicitar su ayuda: necesito que vaya a Leethus y organice el transporte del Diezmo Imperial a Dargonus para salvaguardarlo».
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal looks straight at you.{/n} "Given the scarcity of our resources, absolute secrecy is Leethus's main line of defence. However, we are detecting... increased activity near the storage world's location. I do not want to do this, but I am, quite plainly, forced to ask for your help: go to Leethus and organise the extraction of the Imperial Tithe to Dargonus for further safekeeping."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Mariscal te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Dada nuestra escasez de recursos, el secretismo absoluto es la principal defensa de Leethus. Sin embargo, estamos detectando... un aumento de actividad cerca de la ubicación del mundo almacén. No me gusta, pero me veo francamente forzado a solicitar su ayuda: necesito que vaya a Leethus y organice el transporte del Diezmo Imperial a Dargonus para salvaguardarlo».

languages.text: {n}元帅直直地盯着你。{/n}“鉴于我们人手不足，只有绝对保密才能保障利瑟斯的安全。然而，我们最近却发现，利瑟斯周边出现了……频繁的活动迹象。尽管我并不想麻烦你，但鉴于当下的情形，我不得不请求你的帮助。我需要你前往利瑟斯，将征收来的帝国什一税转移到达戈努斯，以便妥善保管。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal looks straight at you.{/n} "Given the scarcity of our resources, absolute secrecy is Leethus's main line of defence. However, we are detecting... increased activity near the storage world's location. I do not want to do this, but I am, quite plainly, forced to ask for your help: go to Leethus and organise the extraction of the Imperial Tithe to Dargonus for further safekeeping."

traits.locale_text: {n}元帅直直地盯着你。{/n}“鉴于我们人手不足，只有绝对保密才能保障利瑟斯的安全。然而，我们最近却发现，利瑟斯周边出现了……频繁的活动迹象。尽管我并不想麻烦你，但鉴于当下的情形，我不得不请求你的帮助。我需要你前往利瑟斯，将征收来的帝国什一税转移到达戈努斯，以便妥善保管。”

languages.text: {n}Der Marschall sieht dich direkt an.{/n} "Angesichts unserer begrenzten Ressourcen ist absolute Geheimhaltung für Leethus der beste Schutz. Allerdings registrieren wir ... verstärkte Aktivitäten im Umfeld der Lagerwelt. Ich will das selbst nicht, bin aber offen gesagt gezwungen, Euch um Hilfe zu bitten: Fliegt nach Leethus und organisiert den Transport des imperialen Zehnts nach Dargonus zur sicheren Aufbewahrung."
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal looks straight at you.{/n} "Given the scarcity of our resources, absolute secrecy is Leethus's main line of defence. However, we are detecting... increased activity near the storage world's location. I do not want to do this, but I am, quite plainly, forced to ask for your help: go to Leethus and organise the extraction of the Imperial Tithe to Dargonus for further safekeeping."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Marschall sieht dich direkt an.{/n} "Angesichts unserer begrenzten Ressourcen ist absolute Geheimhaltung für Leethus der beste Schutz. Allerdings registrieren wir ... verstärkte Aktivitäten im Umfeld der Lagerwelt. Ich will das selbst nicht, bin aber offen gesagt gezwungen, Euch um Hilfe zu bitten: Fliegt nach Leethus und organisiert den Transport des imperialen Zehnts nach Dargonus zur sicheren Aufbewahrung."

languages.text: {n}将帥は真っ直ぐにあなたを見る。{/n}「私たちの資源が少ないことを考えると、リーザスの主要な防衛線は完全な秘密です。しかし、私たちは保管惑星の近くで活動が活発化していることに気づいています…こんなことはしたくないのですが、あなたに助けを求めなければなりません。さらなる安全確保のためにリーザスに行き、ダルゴナスへの帝国租税の抽出を組織していただけませんか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal looks straight at you.{/n} "Given the scarcity of our resources, absolute secrecy is Leethus's main line of defence. However, we are detecting... increased activity near the storage world's location. I do not want to do this, but I am, quite plainly, forced to ask for your help: go to Leethus and organise the extraction of the Imperial Tithe to Dargonus for further safekeeping."

traits.locale_text: {n}将帥は真っ直ぐにあなたを見る。{/n}「私たちの資源が少ないことを考えると、リーザスの主要な防衛線は完全な秘密です。しかし、私たちは保管惑星の近くで活動が活発化していることに気づいています…こんなことはしたくないのですが、あなたに助けを求めなければなりません。さらなる安全確保のためにリーザスに行き、ダルゴナスへの帝国租税の抽出を組織していただけませんか？」

languages.text: {n}Miralay doğrudan sana bakıyor.{/n} "Kısıtlı kaynaklarımız göz önüne alındığında Leethus'ın ana savunma unsuru, mutlak gizliliktir. Gelgelelim tespitlerimiz... Depo dünyanın konumu yakınlarında artan bir hareketlilik olduğu yönünde. İstemeye istemeye de olsa sizden yardım talep etmek zorundayım... Leethus'a gidin ve İmparatorluk aşarının saklanmak üzere Dargonus'a aktarılması için gerekenleri yapın."
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal looks straight at you.{/n} "Given the scarcity of our resources, absolute secrecy is Leethus's main line of defence. However, we are detecting... increased activity near the storage world's location. I do not want to do this, but I am, quite plainly, forced to ask for your help: go to Leethus and organise the extraction of the Imperial Tithe to Dargonus for further safekeeping."
